review: Still on the fence with this one.. Not what I expected.
author: Ol' Lady

review: Streaming quality is good... I felt the pic quality was better than Roku 3 devices I have used in the past. Apps available are quite limited; Youtube app needs to be improved quite a bit. I tried Plex, Netflix and amazon apps- they all worked good.
author: Suresh S "ssb"

review: Received it today.  Hook-up so easy, was watching Netflix within 5 minutes! Now I have a "smart" TV!UPDATE: Have had this for several months now and have had no problems whatsoever with it. I am SO happy I got this for my TV, I can watch anything any time..
author: Andie

review: Best streaming investment I ever made and the cost was great!
author: Jenn1017

review: very satisfy. Less one star just for the remote: too small and difficult to type words...
author: william halim

review: I like it. It's a good deal for the price. It was easy to set up. I didn't have any problems. I corrected the cord into the HMI on the back of the TV and connected it to my Wi-Fi and was done in 10 minutes.
author: DOREATHER HARVEY
